v8:item.v8:content: The report or data processor will be attached to the application in unsafe mode. For more information about attachment modes, see the form help.
The report or data processor will be attached to the application in safe mode. For more information about attachment modes, see the form help.
To view or edit a report option, save it as an additional report and set the Availability to "Available."
In forms of catalog and document items
Decoration safe mode with permissions icon
The report or data processor will be attached to the application with a custom security profile %1, which allows the following actions:
The report or data processor will be attached to the application in unsafe mode because it requires the following operations with external resources:
The report or data processor will be attached to the application in safe mode with additional permissions:

To "isolate" possibility to access external resources from an additional report or data processor code only by the above mentioned operations, it is required to <link int://sp-on>enable security profiles</>. A "personal" security profile will be created for the additional report or data processor. This profile contains permissions for performing only approved operations. You no longer need to attach the additional report or data processor to the application without setting the safe mode.
For more information about additional report and data processor attachment modes, see Help.
Run the selected command of report or data processor.
